remarks: More general version of ~ 3imtr3i .  Useful for converting definitions in a formula.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-1996.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 20-Dec-2013.)
statement:
3imtr3g.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
3imtr3g.2 $e |- ( ps <-> th ) $.
3imtr3g.3 $e |- ( ch <-> ta ) $.
3imtr3g $p |- ( ph -> ( th -> ta ) ) $.
